publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6005 Angela Constance: Congratulations to the Pitstop in Addiewell—That the Parliament offers its sincere congratulations to the Pitstop in the Livingston constituency on the organisation’s recent fifth anniversary and commends the Loganlea Miners Welfare Society and Social Club for its tireless efforts spent running and operating a facility that gives people of all age groups opportunities to engage in a variety of activities, servicesand facilities that greatly increase the quality of life in Addiewell and the greater West Lothian area.
S3M-6005 Congratulations to the Pitstop in Addiewell (lodged on 19 March 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Bob Doris*, Ian McKee*
S3M-6005 Congratulations to the Pitstop in Addiewell (lodged on 19 March 2010) Hugh Henry*, Gil Paterson*, Bill Kidd*, Elaine Smith*, Stuart McMillan*
